creator: andreas@apache.org
text:
The "compile" target is invoked before the libraries are copied from the
publications to WEB-INF/lib. This results in compile errors.

Created attachment 11936
Patch for including pub java libs in classpath for compile target
creator: roku@apache.org
roku@apache.org
text:
I attached a patch.

I fixed it a bit different than pointed out above. I included the
pubs/*/java/lib/*.jar dir in the classpath defined in properties-build.xml
instead of copying the pub local libs to webapp.

This seems to be more straight forward than splitting up copying of pub stuff in
different places (build files).
roku, what is the status on this one?
creator: gregor@apache.org
